Marketing campaign analysis use case This chapter dives into an example of a marketing campaign analysis at a financial services organization. In this use case, we use IBM watsonx.data and IBM watsonx.ai to ingest and store data, connect to and access data, visualize and explore data, and build machine learning (ML) models. This chapter guides you through the following tasks: data ingestion, data connection and access, data exploration and visualization, and machine learning model development.
